name: Mr. Godot & Watch
description:
CONTROLS:
ARROW KEYS - MOVE
SPACEBAR - JUMP
P KEY - PAUSE

Or use gamepad.

Simple platform action that starts easy, then gets challenging. Try to collect all 20 gems, finish the game as fast as you can, or both!

A short 2D Platformer I made to help me learn to use Godot. I learned a lot making this, but I still have a lot to learn before I tackle any big projects.
